title: Google\Cloud\Dataform\V1beta1\Repository\GitRemoteSettings
name: GitRemoteSettings
description:
Controls Git remote configuration for a repository.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataform.v1beta1.Repository.GitRemoteSettings

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.default_branch
params.description: Required. The Git remote's default branch name.

params.name: data.authentication_token_secret_version
params.description: Required. The name of the Secret Manager secret version to use as an authentication token for Git operations. Must be in the format projects/*/secrets/*/versions/*.

params.name: data.token_status
params.description: Output only. Indicates the status of the Git access token.
